short_summary: Goods required from National Research Council Canada
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has a requirement for the Clinical Trial Material Facility (CTMF) at 6100 Royalmount in Montreal QC to purchase one (1) year of consumable materials for 11 mixers, 1 Chromatography skids (AKTA READY), 1 TFF Skid (AKTA READYFLUX), and facility Bioreactors, all materials are required to be delivered on or before 15 Oct-2024.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: One Year of CYTIVA Consumable Material for CTMF**
===========================

### Mandatory Fields

* **Tender Reference:** cb-919-5337900
* **Publication Date:** July 9, 2024
* **Closing Date:** July 23, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Contract Duration:** July 26, 2024, to October 15, 2024

### Supplier Information

* **Trade Agreements:** The Government of Canada has bilateral trade agreements with several countries, including Colombia, Honduras, Peru, the United Kingdom, Chile, Ukraine, Korea, Panama, and several others.
* **Contracting Organization:** National Research Council Canada (NRC)

### Tender Description

The National Research Council Canada has a requirement for the Clinical Trial Material Facility (CTMF) to procure one year's worth of consumable materials. The following equipment will be supplied with consumables: eleven (11) mixers, one (1) Chromatography skid (ÄKTA READY), one (1) TFF Skid (AKTA READYFLUX), and facility bioreactors.

### Deliverables and Deadlines

* Consumable materials are expected to be delivered on or before October 15, 2024.
* The contract duration is expected to commence on July 26, 2024, and end on October 15, 2024.

### Documents and Attachments

* For English: [Link to tender notice and attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41734/acan_24_58078_cytiva_fr_final_0.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41734/npp_acan_24-58078_cytiva_consumables_final_docx_0_0.pdf).
* For French: [Link to tender notice and attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41734/acan_24_58078_cytiva_fr_final_0.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41734/npp_acan_24-58078_cytiva_consumables_final_docx_0_0.pdf).

### Contact Information

Cindy Ann Romain
National Research Council Canada
1200 Montreal Rd, M58
Ott
